full_description: Curative is scaling high throughput Covid-19 testing across the US and we are looking for an excellent software support engineer to join the team. This role will be a liaison between internal users and the software organization while providing day-to-day operational system support for our in-house software. The improvements contributed by this role will help improve user experience and testing throughput across the country.Responsibilities:Conduct initial triage for various software issues, ranging from basic login trouble to complex software behaviors, redirecting and escalating requests when necessary.Investigate hard-to-pin down software issues by recreating user workflows and checking logs and the database.Regularly validate changes to the software by executing and documenting tests cases.Improve our in-house software by exploring different user workflows for common user pitfalls and potential improvements.Streamline user access by scoping and expediting complex user access needs.Train members of various departments on our internal software and tools.Follow security best-practices when developing and accessing Curative information and data systems, escalating related concerns to management, IT, or the Information Security team.Requirements:Engineering degree or equivalent experience.Strong independent critical thinking, problem solving, and communication skills.Familiarity with databases and writing SQL queries.Experience with software code and analyzing logs.Ability to keep up with a fast pace.Nice to have:Customer service / support experience.Experience in the following:A software or IT support role.Writing, modifying, and/or executing database
